code.description: Code indicating the success of the operation.

message.description: Additional information or message about the response.

validatorsList.description: List of detailed information for each validator.

stakedHashAmount.description: Total amount of HASH staked by the validator.

realtimeHashAmount.description: Real-time HASH amount for the validator.

stakedBTCScore.description: Staked BTC score for the validator.

stakedCoreScore.description: Staked CORE score for the validator.

estimatedBTCRewardRate.description: Estimated BTC reward rate for the validator.

realtimeHashScore.description: Real-time HASH score for the validator.

realtimeCoreAmount.description: Real-time CORE amount for the validator.

stakedCoreAmount.description: Total amount of CORE staked by the validator.

stakedHashScore.description: Staked HASH score for the validator.

realtimeCoreScore.description: Real-time CORE score for the validator.

rewardAddress.description: Address to receive rewards for the validator.

stakedBTCAmount.description: Total amount of BTC staked by the validator.

logo.description: Logo or image URL of the validator.

realtimeBTCScore.description: Real-time BTC score for the validator.

hybridScore.description: Hybrid score combining metrics of the validator.

estimatedCoreRewardRate.description: Estimated CORE reward rate for the validator.

realtimeBTCAmount.description: Real-time BTC amount for the validator.

status.description: Status of the validator (e.g., active, inactive).

400.description: An error occurred while retrieving validator details.
